website_summaries.verdict: A fun soft climber set that is also available in a range of different colors.
pros: Includes a ramp and a couple of steps
Nonslip bottom keeps the pieces in place
Available in bright colors and in more muted colors
Ideal for ages 6 months to 2 years
cons: Set is small and some toddlers lose interest once they "master" it

customer_reviews.title: My 12 month old likes it. I've ordered another ...
customer_reviews.text: My 12 month old likes it. I've ordered another set to have more pieces to make it bigger so there is a little more to do than just climb up and then slide/fall down. To correct another reviewer, there are Velcro strips attached at the bottom of each piece, and it comes with 4 wider Velcro strips that are unattached and span the distance from one Velcro strip on one piece to another Velcro strip on the other piece, thereby connecting them. When all pieces are velcro'ed together, the set is stable and does not slide.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Must Have !
customer_reviews.text: The best toy purchase ever! Our child got this when she was 10 months old and now she’s almost 1 and she loves it! It’s great for the corner of the room or the pieces all move easily with heavy duty Velcro. The colors are nice not to vibrant, and a huge plus is how easy it is to wipe down clean!
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies climbing & small spaces
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and nephew love climbing on this. When they are older I'll turn it into a reading corner. The Velcro keeps all the pieces together. While I wish I had purchased a larger one, this size really is perfect for our little playrooms corner.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Size doesn't matter.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Super soft. Easy for littles to climb on. My daughter seems to really enjoy it. Cons: Not nearly as big as I thought it would be. Really short and small. Update: Daughter is now 19mo old and this is her favorite thing to play with. She loves walking, climbing, and running down the slope.
customer_reviews.author: Heather McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Color scheme is great, awesome product for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for our 2.5 and 1 year old alike! Love the colors. Edit Update: Still amazing, still looks brand new. Not an easy feat for it's use! Cleans well, with just a wipe down & sanitize spray. Our late walker (17 mos) actually finally started to move & climb on this. She also started to finally pull herself to stand & actually stood alone for the first time beside this product! Friends with kids love it when they come over & yes, 1,000 percent worth it! (I mean, it helps so much during winter, then quarantine!!!)
customer_reviews.author: A.G.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great item for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Normally I wouldn’t buy one of these, because I don’t fee like they are used long enough for the money. However, my daughter has a gross motor delay, so I felt like we would use it a lot more than normal. Let me just say I am so glad we did!! She loves, is on it constantly, and I love it! It seems like it is going to last for quite some time, is a decent size, and was a great price. These can get quite expensive, and under $200 is a deal to me. Plus, my daughter’s physical therapist is already wanting to buy it from me when we are done with it!
customer_reviews.author: kristen philips

customer_reviews.title: very small, not connected
customer_reviews.text: This is much, much smaller than it appears, and the pieces are all separate and don’t velcro together. There are velcro strips in places that don’t connect the way it is configured in the photo, so I’m not quite sure why they are there. For two hundred dollars, it is not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: K and N

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for home use
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for home use, my son likes this (11months) but his cousins (2 & 4 ) like it even more! It’s good to note that there are straps attached to the underside of one piece that you will use to hold all 4 pieces together!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby approved!
customer_reviews.text: Got these when the baby started showing an interest in climbing. They’re a hit! I can stand on them without them squishing much in so they are very sturdy. We had a coffee catastrophe the other day and they wiped clean with ease! Thinking of getting more pieces!
customer_reviews.author: sonja :)

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to play area!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month old loves her new climbing blocks. The quality is good. The only slight issue I have is that the velcro is at the bottom, so the top of the blocks tend to form small gaps when she climbs on them. It would be great if there was velcro on the top and the bottom for extra security.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Appeals to a variety of ages of children
customer_reviews.text: I purchased corner climber as well as the blocks for my playroom. It fit perfectly in a space I had in a corner although I did add cushioned floor tile over the hardwood floor before using the climber. The current class of kids is aged 1 1/2 through 2 1/2 and they all love it. The velcro strips hold all of the pieces together very well. When the kids aren't playing on it they often "meet-up" on it to talk/sit. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: brenda hebert

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Must get!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! It does come with the extra velcro. It is up to you to apply it to whatever pieces you wish to attach it to. Some already have parts of it attached. Anyway, it has VERY durable, washable (juice spills gone) and keeps my kiddos busy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good idea but bad material
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun product for toddlers, however the material is not so durable. I bought this for my nephew and he only had ot for maybe 2 months give or take, the material is already peeling.
customer_reviews.author: Ching Saetern

customer_reviews.title: Great for littles
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 12 month old to play on in the house. It’s small enough to fit in our living room and I don’t feel like she can fall off and get hurt. She loves climbing up the wedge!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Hobart

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month old loves to climb on this. I’ve also sat on the blocks many times and it does not seem to effect the structure. The best part is that this set has velcro attachments so the blocks never shift. Very easy to clean. I p,an to buy extra blocks in the future to build a bigger play area.
customer_reviews.author: Micindy

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 15 month old for Christmas. She loves them! The size is nice. They seem to be very durable and are holding up well. We also got the blocks by this same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then expected
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much! My son loves crawling on it and he’s learning how to climb and walk up the steps! It’s really great for kids just starting out, but it is smaller then the pictures made me think it would be, but it’s an ok size for babies to start out with. We got my son it for Christmas and he loves to play on it
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: very cute.
customer_reviews.text: It is very cute. I hope the kids will use it a lot. Perfect for the little ones who aren't big enough to climb up the ladder of the slide.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bradbury

customer_reviews.title: The best purchase by far for my little one.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 6 month old. He loves crawling and standing on it. It is super sturdy and the Velcro holds to gather very well. Such a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great for floor time!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my niece and she loves it. Her parents mentioned she doesn't try standing on her own yet. Within the first 10 minutes of sitting on this she used the steps to pull herself up! I would definitely recommend this as a fun option for your baby's playtime! The blue shades are so pretty too!
customer_reviews.author: lilplurpanda

customer_reviews.title: OK but missing pieces To actually connect it
customer_reviews.text: My one-year-old absolutely loves it and the quality of it is good but my one huge complaint is that I had to go out and buy Velcro so the pieces would actually connect together and not slide.It came with the one part Velcro but is missing the other. A little frustrating for almost $200 because now I have to go out and buy something to actually make it work
customer_reviews.author: Blaze pink hunter

customer_reviews.title: Tear in slope
customer_reviews.text: I had a part with a hole in it from the first week purchased. please get ahold of me
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: As a gift I can only judge by all the pictures I receive of my granddaughter using them. As a beginning crawler she was safe and challenged by this set.
customer_reviews.author: N Levine

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this when my baby was 9 months old and crawling. She is now walking and loves climbing around on this and going down the "slide". It was especially nice to have during the winter months as an indoor play area. She also likes to sit in a nook we created by using the triangle to "read" books. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite baby purchases
customer_reviews.text: My son is super stoked on these. He’s been a rowdy baby since day one and he loves climbing these and rolling around. I can see him using them for a long time, probably years, so I’ll definitely get my money’s worth out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Krysten Burton

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Strong! Perfect for ages 6 months to 7years. I'm in love!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 19 month old still loves playing on this.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter started getting on the couch but i wanted her to practice crawling around on something a little closer to the ground first. She loves this thing, and she loves running up and down it.
customer_reviews.author: NUGtonious

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Product is nice I would have given it a higher rating if there was a way to secure them to each other better. Perhaps have more velcro
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great Play Blocks !
customer_reviews.text: Good construction. Perfect for children 1 - 4 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Deptola

customer_reviews.title: It’s a magnet for my baby who’s 11.5 months old
customer_reviews.text: This product is Amazing, I was skeptical about it. With that being said my baby loves it she’s 11.5 months premie born at 32 weeks and she is loving climbing on it. The foam is very soft but firm. Very satisfied but I did just buy this so I can’t say how durable it is, other than the fact it looks and feels very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea C.

customer_reviews.title: So pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.text: We saw a foam play set similar to this on a cruise and went searching for one. This is the BEST value. Looks solidly constructed and durable. Our grandson loves it! So pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: bikeref

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Our baby loves this, and it holds our weight too without slipping apart. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: this is so cute and my daughter loves it, super easy to place together. good job!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Music

customer_reviews.title: It definitely needs it because other wise the pieces move apart very easily. Purchased with the intent of using as one ...
customer_reviews.text: 9mo enjoys, I just wish this product came with a floor velcro pad that all the pieces could stick to. It definitely needs it because other wise the pieces move apart very easily. Purchased with the intent of using as one piece instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I got it as a birthday present for him and my baby loves it. It is a little pricey but it is made well.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Versatile gross motor toy
customer_reviews.text: These are so fun! You can arrange them any way you like. Good for crawling babies or even older toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia J.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My twins have loved this from 6 months and still at 15 months, even a 3 year old who came.over loved it.
customer_reviews.author: readerlily

customer_reviews.title: For adults to sit on while in play pen
customer_reviews.text: Great for the play area. I use it to sit on it myself when I’m in the play pen while my little one climbs around.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie Kau

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We are so glad we got these! Our grandson plays on them all the time. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: My very active 10 month old loves this set,
customer_reviews.text: My very active 10 month old loves this set, loves to climb yet its low enough if he tumbles he is unhurt
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 3 year old and 1 year old to play together. They are on it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! Our little one plays on it daily since we got it at one year. I only wish we had gotten it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All three kiddos love it. There ages are 1, 3 and 5.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne M Maska

customer_reviews.title: My 11 month old loves climbing on this. I ...
customer_reviews.text: My 11 month old loves climbing on this. I think she will get several years of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is brilliant and our daughter LOVES it. We dont have stairs for her crawling and climbing skills so this was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: M. green

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Last
customer_reviews.text: The product lasted about one year and had to be discarded from the classroom because several of the corners ripped and tore (with normal use) exposing the foam inside...this potentially creates a choking hazard for infants and toddlers and a sanitation issue as the interior foam is absorbent and cannot be properly sanitized. The price is reasonable but be prepared to replace annually or doctor with duct tape. This review came about as I searched for options to return and there none....only an option to review product.
customer_reviews.author: tammy hicks

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good size for my 18-month baby, she love to slide and play with it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Smith

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: My One year old LOVEs it. Climbs on it all the time. Even my daycare kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: mandie

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids who already have strong balance.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but still to high of a drop off edge for my 12m old. My 3yo loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for climbers
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this and uses it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Toddler must have
customer_reviews.text: My 19 month plays on it every day. It’s a big hit in our house
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: My one year old LOVES these! Best purchase I’ve ever made!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this set I purchased this to add to the other pieces that I have my daycare kids love
customer_reviews.author: jasmine harris

customer_reviews.title: Love this item....
customer_reviews.text: I am a child care provider and this was perfect for my infant and toddler room. The kids use it on a daily basis and so far it has lasted through jumps, slides and sitting. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The pieces have Velcrow on the wrong sides, so ...
customer_reviews.text: The pieces have Velcrow on the wrong sides, so the pieces did not stay together when my son tried to crawl on them.
customer_reviews.author: artie Fields

product_meta.title: ECR4Kids SoftZone Tiny Twisting Foam Corner Climber - Indoor Active Play Structure for Toddlers and Kids - Soft Foam Play Set, Primary
product_meta.description: Color:AssortedDaycare and preschool age children can safely explore new heights on the SoftZone Tiny Twisting Foam Climber from ECR4Kids, a beginner climber with a spiral staircase, platform for relaxing, and a slide. Offering a fun and captivating selection of shapes and bright colors, this SoftZone play structure encourages movement and muscle action that help to develop gross motor skills as well as social interaction. The SoftZone Tiny Twisting Foam Climber is constructed of higher-density polyurethane foam to keep children safe while they explore, and it's covered with reinforced, phthalate-free vinyl in bright primary and secondary colors that's easy to wipe clean. ECR4Kids SoftZone play structures have achieved GREENGUARD [GOLD} Certification for meeting or exceeding standards for low emissions into indoor air during product usage. They are also CPSIA-compliant for safety, and adhere to CA-117 requirements for fire retardancy. With a concentration on the Pre K-12 sector, ECR4Kids offers a wide range of products from tables, chairs and desks to cots, mats and a variety of storage cases in solid wood as well as scratch resistant double-sided laminate.
feature_bullets: FUN FOAM ACTIVITY PLAY SET: The ECR4Kids SoftZone Tiny Twisting Foam Corner Climber is designed to let infants and toddlers climb, crawl, and slide on a collection of five foam shapes
CORNER CLIMBER: The soft foam climber for should be placed in the corner of a room to provide additional support for little ones to who are learning to balance, crawl and climb
ACTIVE PLAY SET: Designed to be safe, flexible, and fun; the dense foam structure keeps kids safe and cozy as they play and features a non-slip bottom to keep pieces stable and in place
LOW MAINTENANCE: We’ve developed our kids’ climbers to be user friendly for parents; soft yet colorful covers are durable and easy to clean, simply wipe down with a mild soap and water solution

GROSS MOTOR: This toddler corner climber allows little ones to develop important gross motor skills such as climbing, crawling and sliding as they move and play at home, at daycare or in the classroom
CERTIFIED AND SAFE: GREENGUARD[GOLD] Certified for healthier indoor air, constructed with CertiPUR-US Certified foams, made without phthalates, CPSIA and CA-117 compliant for added safety
ADULT SUPERVISION REQUIRED: Children should remove shoes before use; it recommended for kids 6 months to 2 years old; adult supervision is required
DIMENSIONS & CARE: This ECR4Kids Tiny Twisting Foam Corner Climber set measures 40″ L × 40″ W × 10″ H and weighs 16 pounds overall; clean with a soft towel and mild soap and water solution
